title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Flexible Learning Design for Nursing Education: Online Asynchronous

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of nursing theory and practical applications
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply nursing theories and practical skills with over 80% accuracy using online asynchronous modules in a flexible learning environment.
Learners can effectively communicate with peer learners and instructors using LMS-based collaboration tools.
Learners can meet the requirements of a nursing education program within three months by establishing a self-directed learning plan.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
